Hydras/Nightlight


From: Preston Carroll 
Sent: Sunday, April 04, 2010 3:3=
4 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: BlackFortress


  
> He hoped=
 his fortelling would ease suspicions among the Predacons and Decepticons. =
After all, confessing something as such was a big gamble for any bot.

Scor=
ponok's casual yet threatening stance stiffened as he listened to
Nightshif=
t's words. "Interesting." Scorponok said, a sly smile
spreading across his =
face. "So my analysis of him came out as I
suspected." Scorponok rubbed his=
 chin thoughtfully with a massive
claw.

Scorponok was about to say more wh=
en a call came though from Hydras . . .

> Hydras send a secret com link to=
 Scorponok "What is the result so far onf the interrogation?"

While not le=
tting Nightshift hear Hydras' voice, Scorponok made no
effort his own words=
, "Nightshift is a spy and can switch his faction
insignia when he chooses,=
 and so have access to basic information."
Scorponok's optics never left Ni=
ghtshift as he spoke, "and it would
seem that this access has told him that=
 Tuscon has become a Prime."

(TAG)

Preston
